title: IEEE Conference Presentation 2025 – IEEE SILCON
description: Presented as the main author the research paper: "Machine Learning for Early Detection and Risk Stratification of Chronic Kidney Disease" at the IEEE SILCON 2025 International Conference, organized by NIT Nagaland. [View ORCID Profile](https://orcid.org/0009-0005-3878-7317)

title: IEEE Conference Presentation 2025
description: Delivered a presentation as the main author at an IEEE-recognized international conference, showcasing the research paper: "EDS-DPCXT: Efficient Data Security Using a Deque-Based Product Cipher and XOR-Based Transformations." [View ORCID Profile](https://orcid.org/0009-0005-3878-7317)

title: International Conference Presentation 2025 – ICMCE
description: Presented as the main author the research paper: "Spam Detection with AdaBoost and Random Forest" at the International Conference on Modern Trends in Computers and Electronics (ICMCE-2025). [Read Publication](https://iipbooks.com/books/3007/wishlist.html)

title: ICAAST 2025 – International Conference Presentation
description: Presented the research paper titled: "Sleep Disorders Classification using Multidimensional Health and Behavioral Data: A Machine Learning Approach" at the 1st International Conference on Advances in Applied Sciences and Technologies (ICAAST-2025), organized by COER University, Roorkee, Uttarakhand.

title: Book Chapter Publication 2025
description: Authored a book chapter titled: "Predictive Modelling for Hepatitis C Diagnosis Using SMOTE and Supervised Learning Techniques" published in 'Engineering AI for Healthcare: Models, Data, and Applications (2025)'. [Read on Google Books](https://play.google.com/store/books/details?id=DBqPEQAAQBAJ)

title: Conference Paper Publication 2025
description: Authored the paper: "Spam Detection with AdaBoost and Random Forest" published in 'Trends and Challenges in Electronics and Computer Systems (2025)'. [Read Publication](https://iipbooks.com/books/3007/wishlist.html)

title: Leading Research Mentor – DcodersSquad
description: Leading a team of 5 members in the DcodersSquad Research Group, mentoring them in machine learning research, publication preparation, and experimentation. [View ORCID Profile](https://orcid.org/0009-0005-3878-7317)

title: Uttrakhand State Badminton Player
description: Competed in state-level badminton tournaments representing Uttarakhand.

title: Title of "Cheetah" at DcodersSquad
description: Recognized for outstanding speed, precision, and performance in technical projects and problem-solving at the COER Tech Group.

title: Appreciation from HOD of CSE
description: Received recognition for exceptional contributions to DcodersSquad and the CSE Department for leadership and research excellence.
